subject: problem with pedal board simsonn pro x utra
description_text:
Good morning, I received the pedal PRO X ultra assembly yesterday, and
after installing it, I noticed that the LEDs on the left side of the brake
pedal aren't working.
What can I do? Everything else seems to be working fine.

Aliexpress order number: 3063685768652783.

I look forward to your feedback

conversations.body_text: Hi Andrea Pasotti,  Please provide your order number, contact name, phone number, and address, and we will send a replacement left brake LED assembly for you.

Good morning,   thanks for your quick feedback. The address to send the spare part is as follows:  Andrea Pasotti  Via 1850 n.235  25068  Sarezzo (bs)  Italy  Phone number : +39 3334441579     Numero d'ordine Aliexpress: 3063685768652783.     Grazie

Good morning,
I responded to your requests on your ticket portal. Please let me know if
everything is OK.

Thanks.


Il Lun 24 Nov 2025, 08:58 support@simsonn.com
Hi Andrea Pasotti,     Your product has been shipped. The logistics number is:YT2532900706882374. You can track it at this website:https://t.17track.net/zh-cn#nums=YT2532900706882374
